appDesc.message: An open-source DNS-based ad-blocker that operates based on host filtering to block ads, malware, phishing hostnames

optionsMSG3.message: This hostname is not being blocked

optionsBlacklist.message: Additional blacklist hosts: Comma-separated list of additional hostnames to be blocked.

optionsWhitelist.message: Whitelist domains: Comma-separated list of top level hostnames that Host AdBlocker is disabled on.
